name: Loki
description: Adopted son of Odin and half-brother to Thor, Loki Laufeyson has long coveted the throne of Asgard. A master of sorcery and illusion, Loki has earned his title as the God of Mischief. Though Loki has often fought against his brother Thor and many of Earth's greatest champions, he has at times joined forces with them as wellâ€”when it serves his own ends.
